fields.name: heroSection
fields.title: 1. HERO SECTION - Main Banner at Top of Page

fields.description: The main content section with two paragraphs and a quote box

fields.defaultValue: A Passion for Wellness, Made Accessible
fields.name: title
fields.title: Section Heading

fields.defaultValue: After years observing the sauna industry, we noticed something troubling: premium saunas were selling for over $40,000, putting the wellness benefits of regular sauna use out of reach for most Canadians. We believed there had to be a better way.
fields.name: paragraph1
fields.title: FIRST Paragraph (Long Text Block)

fields.defaultValue: That belief drove us to reimagine what a luxury sauna company could be. By cutting out excessive markups and focusing on direct relationships with our customers, we've created premium saunas that rival those costing three times as much.
fields.name: paragraph2
fields.title: SECOND Paragraph (Long Text Block)

fields.defaultValue: We provide an affordable luxury product that can be easily installed in a short time frame – bringing the transformative power of sauna wellness to more Canadian homes.
fields.description: The italicized quote in the gray box
fields.name: quote
fields.title: QUOTE BOX (Big Highlighted Text)

fields.name: passionSection
fields.title: 2. PASSION SECTION - "A Passion for Wellness"

fields.description: Section with rotating background images and text

fields.defaultValue: Every Ilio sauna is proudly crafted in British Columbia using locally sourced Western Red Cedar and time-tested construction techniques.
fields.name: paragraph1
fields.title: FIRST Paragraph (Text Beside Slideshow)

fields.defaultValue: We believe in supporting local artisans and maintaining the highest quality standards from forest to finish.
fields.name: paragraph2

fields.name: craftsmanshipSection
fields.title: 4. CRAFTSMANSHIP SECTION - "BC Craftsmanship Meets Scandinavian Tradition"

fields.description: White background section with three paragraphs

fields.defaultValue: At Ilio, we believe that wellness should be a daily ritual, not a luxury reserved for the few. We stand for quality without compromise, craftsmanship that honors tradition while embracing innovation, and transparency in everything we do.
fields.description: The first paragraph of values content
fields.name: paragraph1
fields.title: FIRST Paragraph

fields.defaultValue: Our commitment extends beyond delivering exceptional saunas. We're dedicated to educating our customers about the profound benefits of heat therapy, supporting sustainable forestry practices, and contributing to the wellness of our communities.
fields.description: The second paragraph of values content
fields.name: paragraph2
fields.title: SECOND Paragraph

fields.defaultValue: When you choose Ilio, you're not just investing in a sauna – you're joining a movement that believes wellness should be accessible, sustainable, and transformative for all Canadians.
fields.description: The third paragraph of values content
fields.name: paragraph3
fields.title: THIRD Paragraph

fields.initialValue: At Ilio, we believe wellness should be accessible, beautiful, and transformative. Our contemporary saunas combine Scandinavian craftsmanship with modern design principles.
fields.name: paragraph1
fields.title: First Paragraph

fields.initialValue: Each sauna is precision-engineered from sustainably sourced Western Red Cedar and fitted with advanced heating systems for an experience that lasts.
fields.name: paragraph2
fields.title: Second Paragraph

fields.initialValue: We're so confident you'll love your Ilio sauna that we offer a full 30-day trial. If you're not experiencing deeper sleep, less stress, and that post-sauna glow—we'll arrange pickup and issue a complete refund. No questions, no hassle.

initialValue: Keep all accessories as our gift

fields.initialValue: *In 3 years, we've had exactly 2 returns. Both customers bought larger models.
